Container.Name: NZBGet
Container.Description: NZBGet is a cross-platform binary newsgrabber for nzb files, written in C++. It supports client/server mode, automatic par-check/-repair, web-interface, command-line interface, etc. NZBGet requires low system resources and runs great on routers, NAS-devices and media players.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : in this path NZBget will store it's configuration files.[br] [b]/downloads[/b] : in this path, NZBget will store the downloaded files.[br][br] [b]Tip:[/b] The default username is nzbget and the default password is tegbzn6789.
